tensortrade.oms.orders.create.proportion_order(portfolio: Portfolio, source: Wallet, target: Wallet, proportion: float) → Order[source]Â¶

Creates an order that sends a proportion of funds from one wallet to another.

Parameters

  • portfolio (Portfolio) â€“ The portfolio that contains both wallets.

  • source (Wallet) â€“ The source wallet for the funds.

  • target (Wallet) â€“ The target wallet for the funds.

tensortrade.oms.orders.create.risk_managed_order(side: TradeSide, trade_type: TradeType, exchange_pair: ExchangePair, price: float, quantity: Quantity, down_percent: float, up_percent: float, portfolio: Portfolio, start: int = None, end: int = None)[source]Â¶

Create a stop order that manages for percentages above and below the entry price of the order.

Parameters

  • side (TradeSide) â€“ The side of the order.

  • trade_type (TradeType) â€“ The type of trade to make when going in.

  • exchange_pair (ExchangePair) â€“ The exchange pair to perform the order for.

  • price (float) â€“ The current price.

  • down_percent (float) â€“ The percentage the price is allowed to drop before exiting.

  • up_percent (float) â€“ The percentage the price is allowed to rise before exiting.

  • quantity (Quantity) â€“ The quantity of the order.

  • portfolio (Portfolio) â€“ The portfolio being used in the order.

  • start (int, optional) â€“ The start time of the order.

  • end (int, optional) â€“ The end time of the order.

Returns

Order â€“ A stop order controlling for the percentages above and below the entry price.
